statements.name: PROC JSON
statements.description: Specifies the JSON output file and controls the resulting output.

statements.name: EXPORT
statements.description: Identifies the SAS data set to be exported and controls the resulting output.

statements.name: WRITE VALUES
statements.description: Writes one or more values to the JSON output file.

statements.name: WRITE OPEN
statements.description: Opens and nests a JSON container in the output file.

statements.name: WRITE CLOSE
statements.description: Closes a JSON container that is open in the JSON output file.
